Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Red Line trains have resumed making stops at 69th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
